price: Sunã da bushãra a cikin rãyuwar dũniya da ta Lãhira. Bãbu musanyãwa ga kalmõmin Allah. Wancan shi ne babban rabo mai girma,
arabic: لَهُمُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ لَا تَبۡدِيلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lahumu al-bush'rā fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wafī al-ākhirati lā tabdīla likalimāti al-lahi dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
